title: Ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling LLM integration in Node.js and browser apps.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with simple API to chat, generate, and manage local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama supporting chat, model management, and multi-user workspaces.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration for Ollama allowing LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama with async and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client for Ollama with tokio-based async HTTP client and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to local Ollama instance via REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, completion, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama providing generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in Discord servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with thread support and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI text generation using Ollama models inside notes.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for Ollama.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Open pull request adding Ollama support to Hugging Face transformers as an inference provider.
